grails.plugin.cache.ehcache

    public static class GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean.ReloadableCacheManager
extends net.sf.ehcache.CacheManager

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  GrailsEhCacheManagerFactoryBean.ReloadableCacheManager.ProxyEhcache
      An Ehcache implementation that always gets the cache, by name, from the CacheManager Because this CacheManager is reloadable, it may recreate (which is removing then adding) it's underlying caches at any time.
